rows.label: qst702805_msg0001
rows.name:
We all know just how passionate you
are about your work, Morumo.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0002
rows.name:
Tell us about this dream of yours.
It must be something very special if
you're willing to go to such lengths.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0004
rows.name:
The shopping ward...
It everything to Morumo.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0005
rows.name:
Dream of Morumo is to turn it into
biggest trade center in Alst! Better
even than Pyrithium Trade Guild!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0006
rows.name:
And to achieve that dream, you'd
enter into all sorts of shady deals, no
matter what anyone thinks of you?

rows.label: qst702805_msg0007
rows.name:
Morumo need money to make
dream come true! Is not question
of right or wrong. Is necessity!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0008
rows.name:
Save it, Morumo. You preaching
to wrong crowd.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0009
rows.name:
It not matter how beautiful your
dream is. Underhanded methods
never result in good outcome!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0010
rows.name:
Who you to lecture Morumo!
You not my mamapon!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0011
rows.name:
Sadly, not worth effort to tell name
to dumdums like Morumo.
Get ready for spankings!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0012
rows.name: Hold on, Macmac.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0013
rows.name: What? Why?!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0014
rows.name: You said it yourself.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0015
rows.name:
If you want to claim the moral
high ground, you can't take justice
into your own hands.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0016
rows.name:
I think even the villain of the piece
understands this now. Don't you,
Morumo?

rows.label: qst702805_msg0017
rows.name:
Stop. Morumo betrayed hero-hero-
friends. Not deserve your sympathy.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0018
rows.name:
Morumo know what Morumo did was
wrong, OK? Only choice now...is to
pay with own life! Meeeeeeeeh!!!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0019
rows.name: Boss!!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0020
rows.name:
What are you doing up there?!
It's dangerous!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0021
rows.name: ...Meh meh?

rows.label: qst702805_msg0022
rows.name:
Boss angry cause Popolo ate Boss's
share of fluffy potatoes? Popolo never
do it again, swear on life!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0023
rows.name:
I don't know what on Alst
compelled you to do this, but
we all owe our lives to you!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0024
rows.name:
Let us help you for once, you silly
oaf! We're always here when you
need a shoulder to lean on!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0025
rows.name:
We'll overlook your misdemeanors
this time, Morumo. You can start over
with a clean slate.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0026
rows.name: Meh meh?! But...why...

rows.label: qst702805_msg0027
rows.name:
I want you to become a successful
entrepreneur. Just keep it above
board this time, OK?

rows.label: qst702805_msg0028
rows.name:
That can be your atonement. By all
accounts, it won't be easy.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0029
rows.name:
But whatever trials lie ahead of you,
just remember the one, most important
thing. Remember that you're not alone.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0030
rows.name: Ohh, Prince Adel...

rows.label: qst702805_msg0031
rows.name:
Meh...meh...
Morumo is so very sorry!!!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0032
rows.name:
Macmac, you know those Red Pollen
Orbs we seized?

rows.label: qst702805_msg0033
rows.name:
We just "happened" to find them lying
around, didn't we?

rows.label: qst702805_msg0034
rows.name:
Prince Adel, you too soft on dumdums.
Softer than fluffy potato mash!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0035
rows.name:
But Macmac understand. Justice of
Adel-sama is justice of Macmac too.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0036
rows.name:
Macmac take full responsibility of
dumdum Morumo and make sure he
backwinged into reputable tradespon!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0037
rows.name: Meh meh?! Macmac do what?!
